properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR ( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR ( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR ( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) *24 ) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE "BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO "BOARD"(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE "BOARD" SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
